content.prompt: Which of the following is represented by the gradual increase in thickness of the arrows from the top to the bottom of Figure 1?

choices.label: The rate at which nitric oxide triggers signaling gradually increases over time.
The number of signaling molecules that are produced or activated increases with each step in the pathway.
The size of the proteins in the pathway increases as the signaling cascade moves through the cell.
The signaling pathway uses an increase in negative feedback to reduce intracellular Ca2+ levels and cell sensitivity to Ca2+.

skill.text: 2.A: Describe characteristics of visual representations of biological concepts and processes.
